.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`8<T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7, TRest> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7, TRest) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7, typename TRest> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable
type Tuple<'T1, 'T2, 'T3, 'T4, 'T5, 'T6, 'T7, 'Rest> = class interface IStructuralEquatable interface IStructuralComparable interface IComparable

summary.span: 表示 n 元组，n 为 8 或更大值。

span.span: Represents an *n*-tuple, where *n* is 8 or greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示具有八个或更多组件的 n 元组。 The class represents an *n*-tuple that has eight or more components. 可以通过调用静态 方法, 实例化一个正好包含八个组件的对象。You can instantiate a object with exactly eight components by calling the static method. 下面的示例创建一个8元组 (八元组), 其中包含小于20的质数。The following example creates an 8-tuple (octuple) that contains prime numbers that are less than 20. 请注意, 它使用类型推理来确定每个组件的类型。Note that it uses type inference to determine the type of each component. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)] 还可以通过调用构造函数, 实例化包含八个或更多组件的 n 元组对象。You can also instantiate an n-tuple object with eight or more components by calling the constructor. 下面的示例使用构造函数创建一个8元组, 该元组等效于在上一个示例中创建的元组。The following example uses the constructor to create an 8-tuple that is equivalent to the tuple created in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/cs/octuple1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/vb/octuple1.vb#1)] > [!NOTE] > 若要创建包含九个或更多组件的 n 元组, 必须调用构造函数。To create an n-tuple with nine or more components, you must call the constructor. 类的静态工厂方法不支持`Tuple`创建具有超过8个组件的对象。The static factory methods of the class do not support the creation of `Tuple` objects with more than eight components. 若要使用构造函数实例化包含八个或更多组件的 n 元组, 请`Tuple`提供一个泛型`rest`对象作为参数, 以定义元组的第八到第*n*个组件。To instantiate an n-tuple that has eight or more components with the constructor, you supply a generic `Tuple` object as the `rest` parameter to define the eighth through *n*th components of the tuple. 通过以这`Tuple`种方式嵌套泛型对象, 可以创建对其组件数没有实际限制的元组。By nesting generic `Tuple` objects in this way, you can create a tuple that has no practical limitation on the number of its components. 下面的示例创建一个17元组, 该元组包含每个美国人口普查1860到2000的 Detroit 的人口数据。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, for each national census from 1860 to 2000. 该元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The first component of the tuple is the city name. 第二个组件是数据序列的开始日期, 第三个组件是开始日期的人口。The second component is the start date of the data series, and the third component is the population at the start date. 每个后续组件提供十年时间间隔的人口。Each subsequent component provides the population at decade intervals. 通过在 对象中嵌套对象来创建17元组。The 17-tuple is created by nesting a object inside a object. (也就是说, 将对象作为类构造函数中的`rest`参数值提供。)此对象进而嵌套在外部对象中。(That is, the object is supplied as the value of the `rest` parameter in the class constructor.) This object is, in turn, nested in an outer object. (也就是说, 将对象作为外部对象的类构造函数中`rest`的参数值提供。)(That is, the object is supplied as the value of the `rest` parameter in the outer object's class constructor.) [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/example.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/example.vb#19)] 您可以使用只读、 、 、 、、和实例属性检索元组的前七个组件的值。 You can retrieve the value of the tuple's first seven components by using the read-only , , , , , , and instance properties. 任何附加组件都是嵌套的, 可从属性中检索。Any additional components are nested and can be retrieved from the property. 在前面的示例中, 通过属性检索元组的第一个到第七个组件。In the previous example, the through properties retrieve the first through seventh components of the tuple. 第八个到第十四个组件包含在嵌套在第二级的元组中, 由`Rest.Item1`通过`Rest.Item7`属性表示。The eighth through fourteenth components are contained in the tuple that is nested at the second level, and are represented by the `Rest.Item1` through `Rest.Item7` properties. 第十五到第17个组件包含在嵌套于第三级的元组中, 并由`Rest.Rest.Item1` `Rest.Rest.Item3`属性表示。The fifteenth through seventeenth components are contained in the tuple that is nested at the third level, and are represented by the `Rest.Rest.Item1` though `Rest.Rest.Item3` properties. 元组通常以四种不同的方式使用:Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 表示单个数据集。To represent a single set of data. 例如, 元组可以表示数据库记录, 并且其组件可以表示记录的各个字段。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 提供对数据集的轻松访问和操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. - 从方法返回多个值, 而不使用`out`参数 (在中C#) 或`ByRef`参数 (在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如, 上一个示例在对象中返回其计算统计信息以及城市名称。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the city name, in a object. - 若要通过单个参数向方法传递多个值, 则为。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如, 该方法只有一个参数, 该参数使你可以为启动时线程执行的方法提供一个值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果提供对象作为方法参数, 则可以为线程的启动例程提供七个数据项。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread's startup routine with seven items of data.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用静态方法实例化8元组 (八元组) 对象, 而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can also use the static method to instantiate an 8-tuple (octuple) object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法实例化包含小于20的质数的8元组对象。The following example uses the method to instantiate an 8-tuple object that contains prime numbers that are less than 20. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)] 这等效于对类构造函数的以下调用。This is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/cs/octuple1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/vb/octuple1.vb#1)] 但是, 静态方法不能用于创建包含8个以上组件的元组对象。However, the static method cannot be used to create a tuple object with more than eight components. 使用构造函数创建包含八个或更多组件的 n 元组时, 可以`rest`使用参数创建一个包含1到7个组件的嵌套 n 元组。When using the constructor to create an n-tuple with eight or more components, you use the `rest` parameter to create a nested n-tuple that has from one to seven components. 通过使用连续的嵌套级别, 可以创建一个具有几乎不受限制的组件数的 n 元组。By using successive levels of nesting, you can create an n-tuple that has a virtually unlimited number of components. 例如, 若要创建25元组, 可以实例化包含三个嵌套级别的对象, 如下所示:For example, to create a 25-tuple, you instantiate a object with three levels of nesting, as follows: - 最外面的对象包含第一个到第七个组件。The outermost object contains the first through seventh components. 其属性提供对第一级嵌套中的对象的访问。Its property provides access to an object at the first level of nesting. - 最外面的嵌套对象包含第8个到第十四个组件, 其属性提供对第二级嵌套的对象的访问。The outermost nested object contains the eighth through fourteenth components, and its property provides access to an object at the second level of nesting. - 第二级嵌套的 对象包含第15到第20个到第15个组件, 其属性提供对第三个嵌套级别的对象的访问。 The object at the second level of nesting contains the fifteenth through twenty-first components, and its property provides access to an object at the third level of nesting. - 最内层的元组是一个对象, 该对象包含二十秒到第五个组件。The innermost tuple is a object that contains the twenty-second through twenty-fifth components. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个17元组, 该元组包含每个人口普查1860到2000的人口的人口数据 Detroit。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, for each census from 1860 to 2000. 该元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The first component of the tuple is the city name. 第二个组件是一系列数据的开始日期, 第三个组件是开始日期的人口。The second component is the start date of the series of data, and the third component is the population at the start date. 每个后续组件提供十年时间间隔的人口。Each subsequent component provides the population at decade intervals. 该示例使用两层嵌套来创建17元组:它定义7元组, 该元组的第三个和第七个组件包含1860到1900的人口数据、包含1910到1970的人口数据的嵌套7元组, 以及包含用于1980和2000的人口数据的内部嵌套的3元组。The example uses two layers of nesting to create the 17-tuple: It defines a 7-tuple whose third through seventh components contain population data for 1860 through 1900, a nested 7-tuple that contains population data for 1910 through 1970, and an inner nested 3-tuple that contains population data for 1980 through 2000. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/example.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/example.vb#19)]

span.span: is not a generic object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`obj`满足以下所有条件, 则该参数被视为等于当前实例:The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance if it meets all the following conditions: - 它是一个对象。It is a object. - 它的组件总数与当前实例的类型相同。It has the same total number of components that are of the same types as the current instance. - 它的组件 (包括其嵌套组件) 等于当前实例的组件。Its components (including its nested components) are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义五个包含质数的对象。The following example defines five objects that contain prime numbers. 然后, 它将第一个对象与其余的每个对象进行比较。It then compares the first object with each of the remaining objects. 如输出所示, 只有第一个和最后一个对象是相等的, 因为它们具有相同的值。As the output shows, only the first and the last objects are equal, because they have an identical number of components with identical values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 并从该数组中检索由其方法返回的第一个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个17元组对象, 该对象包含从1860到2000的 Detroit 的城市人口数据。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The first component of the 17-tuple is the city name. 该示例使用属性在显示填充数据之前在表头中显示城市名称。The example uses the property to display the city name in the table header before displaying the population data. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item2 As T2
public: property T2 Item2 { T2 get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第二个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's second component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第二个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's second component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 并从其方法返回的数组中检索第二个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the second element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个17元组对象, 该对象包含从1860到2000的 Detroit 的城市人口数据。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17元组的第二个组件是数据序列的第一年。The second component of the 17-tuple is the first year of the data series. 该示例将属性的值分配给一个变量, 然后使用该变量来表示显示其数据的年份。The example assigns the value of the property to a variable, and then uses that variable to represent the year whose data is displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 以及从其方法返回的数组中检索第三个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the third element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个17元组对象, 该对象包含从1860到2000的 Detroit 的城市人口数据。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17元组的第三个组件是1860的人口。The third component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1860. 该示例使用属性来显示总体值, 并计算1860与1870之间人口变动的年率。The example uses the property to display the population value and to calculate the annual rate of population change between 1860 and 1870. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 并从其方法返回的数组中检索第四个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the fourth element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个17元组对象, 该对象包含从1860到2000的 Detroit 的城市人口数据。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17元组的第四个组件是1870的人口。The fourth component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1870. 该示例使用属性来显示总体值, 并计算1870与1880之间人口变动的年率。The example uses the property to display the population value and to calculate the annual rate of population change between 1870 and 1880. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

value.span: 当前 对象的第五个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's fifth component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 并从该数组中检索其方法返回的第五个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the fifth element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个17元组对象, 该对象包含从1860到2000的 Detroit 的城市人口数据。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17元组的第五个分量是1880的人口。The fifth component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1880. 该示例使用属性来显示总体值, 并计算1880与1890之间人口变动的年率。The example uses the property to display the population value and to calculate the annual rate of population change between 1880 and 1890. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的剩余分量。

span.span: Gets the current object's remaining components.

span.span: The value of the current object's remaining components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个嵌套`Tuple`对象, 该对象允许访问元组的第八个第8个组件。 The property returns a nested `Tuple` object that allows access to the eighth though *n*th components of the tuple. 根据元组中的组件总数, 可以从嵌套`Tuple`对象的通过属性检索第8个到第十四个组件的值。Depending on the total number of components in the tuple, the values of the eighth through fourteenth components can be retrieved from the nested `Tuple` object's through properties. 然后, 您可以使用嵌套对象的属性来检索下一`Tuple`层嵌套的对象。You can then use the property of a nested object to retrieve the `Tuple` object at the next level of nesting. 您可以通过从其类型名称提取数字来动态`Tuple`确定由属性返回的嵌套对象中的组件数。You can dynamically determine the number of components in a nested `Tuple` object that is returned by the property by extracting the digit from its type name. 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。The following example provides an illustration. [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/rest.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个17元组对象, 该对象包含从1860到2000的 Detroit 的城市人口数据。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17元组的第七个分量是1900的人口。The seventh component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1900. 该示例使用属性检索第8个到第十四个组件的值, 并使用嵌套对象的属性来检索其余组件的值。The example uses the property to retrieve the values of the eighth through fourteenth components, and it uses the property of the nested object to retrieve the values of the remaining components. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance precedes .
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
A positive integer
This instance follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法允许您定义对象的自定义比较。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如, 您可以使用此方法根据特定组件的值对对象进行排序。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 尽管可以直接调用此方法, 但它最常由包含参数的集合排序方法调用, 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如, 它由方法和使用构造函数实例化的对象的方法调用。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等, 则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等, 请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象数组, 其中包含从1940到2000的四个美国城市的人口数据。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for four U.S. cities from 1940 to 2000. 八元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The octuple's first component is the city name. 其余六个组件表示从1940到2000的10年间隔的人口。The remaining six components represent the population at 10-year intervals from 1940 to 2000. 类提供一个实现, 该实现允许 octuples 的数组按其任何一个组件进行排序。 `PopulationComparer`The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of octuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 在其构造函数中为`PopulationComparer`类提供了两个值:定义排序顺序的组件的位置, 以及指示是否应按升序或降序对元组对象进行排序的值。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: The position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 然后, 该示例以未排序的顺序显示数组中的元素, 按第三个组件 (1950 中的人口) 对它们进行排序并显示它们, 然后按第8个组件 (由2000填充) 对它们进行排序并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1950) and displays them, and then sorts them by the eighth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

Function Equals (other As Object, comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Boolean Implements IStructuralEquatable.Equals

param.name: other
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，该对象定义用于评估两个对象是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值根据指定的比较方法指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. C# 仅当`other`不为`null`时, 才会调用实现,并且如果它可以成功地强制转换(在中)或转换(在VisualBasic)到具有相同的组件总数的对象(包括嵌套`Tuple`对象) 的类型相同。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object that has the same total number of components (including those in nested `Tuple` objects) of the same types as the current instance. 方法首先 传递要与实现进行比较的对象的值。 The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`, 将再次调用方法并传递两个对象的值。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续, 直到方法`false`调用在比较特定对值时返回, 或将两个值传递给方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of values, or the two values are passed to the method.

Function GetHashCode (comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，其 方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的计算方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装对`comparer` 对象实现的调用。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应为被视为相等的两个对象返回相同的哈希代码。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供 类的实现。This method provides the implementation for the class. 尽管可以直接调用方法, 但它通常由集合排序方法 (如和) 的默认重载调用, 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等, 则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等, 请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 此方法使用默认的对象比较器来比较每个组件。This method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 octuples 数组, 其组件是包含质数范围的整数。The following example creates an array of octuples whose components are integers that contain a range of prime numbers. 该示例按未排序的顺序显示数组的元素, 对数组进行排序, 然后按排序顺序显示数组。The example displays the elements of the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then displays the array in sorted order. 输出显示数组已按排序, 或者是元组的第一个组件。The output shows that the array has been sorted by , or the tuple's first component. 请注意, 该示例不会直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由方法为数组中的每个元素隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串采用格式 (*Item1*、 *Item2*、 *Item3*、 *tuple.item4*、 `Item5, Item6, Item7` *Item8*...), 其中*Item1*、 *Item2*、 *Item3*、 *tuple.item4*、 *tuple.item5* *Tuple.item6*和*tuple.item7*表示 、、、 、、和属性的值。 The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, `Item5, Item6, Item7`, *Item8*…), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, and *Item7* represent the values of the , , , , , , and properties. *Item8*表示对象的`Next.Item1`属性的值。*Item8* represents the value of the object's `Next.Item1` property. 任何其他嵌套组件的值都遵循*Item8*。The value of any additional nested components follow *Item8*. 如果任何属性值为`null`, 则将其表示为。 If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个17元组, 该元组包含从1860到1900的 Detroit 的城市人口数据。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 1900. 然后, 它使用方法来显示元组的数据。It then uses the method to display the tuple's data. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.tostring/cs/tostring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.tostring/vb/tostring1.vb#1)]
